```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
v <- signif(runif(1, 0.1, 0.99), 2)

ans <- 1 / sqrt(1 - v^2)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = 0.1, range = c(1, 10*ans), format = TRUE, digits = 2)
```

Question
========
Calculate the Lorentz factor when $v = `r fmt(v, 3)` c$.

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
The Lorentz factor is

$$ \gamma = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 - v^2 / c^2}} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 - `r v`^2}} = `r fmt(ans, 2)` $$
